posts.title: Why Mobile-First Matters in Africa
posts.content: With mobile penetration exceeding 80% in some regions, building mobile-first solutions isn't just smart—it's essential. Here's how startups are winning with it.
posts.author: TechDigest Africa

posts.title: Kofi’s Story: From Garage to Incubator
posts.content: After being rejected by three accelerators, Kofi Mensah bootstrapped his energy-monitoring app from his uncle’s garage. Today, he's been accepted into Y Combinator.
posts.author: Forbes Africa
